body:
Comment 2: 
if true {
} else
  some statement

is valid Go code. You can replace a statement with just a semicolon, so this is also
valid:

if true {
} else
  ;

Stick a label in there and you've got

  if true {
  } else
L:  ;

The y.go program is invalid because of new restrictions in the spec:
  http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=9f8451d277b7aad2ad75a16ba178592c65e8b5d3
  http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=9abbe41e91ff8216562930fb79e04e783b9582d1
